doc.title: Power Rangers Wild Force: Curse of the Wolf

credit.role: Danny Delgado/Black Bison Wild Force Ranger (Iron Bison)
Max Cooper/Blue Shark Wild Force Ranger (Surging Shark)
Cole Evans/Red Lion Wild Force Ranger (Blazing Lion)

doc.plot: Intent on defeating the Rangers once and for all, Master Org releases an Org General, Nayzor, from his stone tomb. Nayzor in turn releases Zen-Aku, a wolf-like mechanical beast who has been imprisoned for 3,000 years, and Zen-Aku traps Elephant Zord! His true identity unknown to him, Zen-Aku at times, seems to be the Rangers' enemy, and at times, a friend. He also commands three Wild Zords of his own. After the Rangers defeat Vacuum Org and later Bus Org, Zen-Aku combines his Dark Wild Zords to form Predazord, which defeats Megazord, and Zen-Aku gains controls of Giraffe Zord! As Taylor and Princess Shayla search for clues about Zen-Aku, the strange wolf creature suddenly shows up with Motorcycle Org. Although the Rangers defeat the Org, Zen-Aku gains control of the Bear Crystals, and thing look bad for the Rangers. The only sign of hope comes when Zen-Aku remembers parts of his past and he become friendlier. Could it be that Zen-Aku was once a friend to the Rangers?
